attributes.title: THE RATS ARE EVERYWHERE
attributes.review: I originally downloaded this app for our great president trump, but to my dismay, once you OPEN the app it emits a frequency that attracts RATS. I just thought it was a coincidence when one showed up in my home, then another one showed up, and then another, and by the time it got to 12 hours later and there were THOUSANDS of rats on my property. Trump I hope you're happy!!!!

attributes.title: BLM
attributes.review: So right when I got this app I was really excited to see what it has in store. But as I opened it the app just turned orange and froze! And all of a sudden it said Hispanics and African Americans and Natives built this land!? I mean im not sure what this is about. I thought the mighty orange built this world with his godly powers. I am very upset 10 out 10 would never support trump again
